articles.description: Allu Arjun and Pooja Hegde took to Instagram and shared pics nd videos to reminisce memories as their blockbuster film  Ala Vaikunthapurramuloo completed two years of release.
articles.content: The blockbuster Telugu film Ala Vaikunthapurramuloo completed two years since its theatrical release and the lead actors, Allu Arjun and Pooja Hegde celebrated the success. While AA shared a few BTS … [+1454 chars]

articles.content:

articles.author: Sharmili Mallick
articles.title: Tearful Adieu: Mortal Remains Of Veteran Actor Mihir Das Consigned To Flames With State Honours - OTV News
articles.description: Apart from family members and friends, a large number of people, including political leaders, Ollywood artists, fans and others gathered at the crematorium and bid a tearful adieu to the departed actor.
articles.content:
Amid loud chants of 'Mihir Bhai Amar Rahe', the mortal remains of veteran actor Mihir Das were consigned to flames with full state honours at Satichoura crematorium in Cuttack on Wednesday morning.
